item.title: Golang Url Encode Decode
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: golang中使用url encoding遇到的小坑 https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13820280/encode-decode-urls Example: Turns "My String" to "My%20String" package urlencode import "net/url" // UrlEncoded encodes a string like Javascript's encodeURIComponent() func UrlEncoded(str string) (string, error) { u, err := url.Parse(str) if err != nil { return "", err } return u.String(), nil } Go语
